lines.text:
[finding the maid pleasuring herself]
Ms. Ginger?
No, hmm... yeah, yeah, I'm Ginger! I mean, Ms. Ginger, sure. Hmm, come in. You're the French teacher, right?

[in French]
Oui. But it seems to me as if you already know all the French you need to know.
Well, I seem to have insatiable thirst for knowledge.
[lifts up her dress tricking him into sex]

[putting one of his fashionable lingeries in the cleavage of the party host's maid]
Take off what you have on, and put this instead.
I don't have any on now... sir.
